name: FlyBall Alpha
description:
Flyball is an Alpha game made as a test for Unity and C#

I will be developing this game while learning C#.

I do not know whether or not I will develop games after Flyball, but I'll figure that out along the way.

In Flyball you need to collect all the points (Flying balls) and avoid touching th cylinders. You, the player, are the moveable square, and can be moved around with WASD, Shift, and Spacebar.

Best played at 1920x1080
